headline: PPG hosts 30th annual PPG Trilak Master Painters' Event for professional painters in Hungary
summary: BUDAPEST - PPG today announced that it recently completed the 30th annual PPG Trilak Master Painters' Event in Hungary, with 700 professional painters from across the country in attendance.This...
